outputs.output_descr:
The institutional capacity of LMAC including RMAC to effectively implement and monitor the Lebanon Mine Action Strategy 2010-2020 in compliance with IMAS and NMAS  is strengthened, the implementation of the Mine Risk Education and Victim Assistance components of the Strategy is effectively planned, monitored and evaluated 
Also, most critical gaps in Minefield Clearance and Battle Area Clearance capacity addressed in the North and South and LMAC communication and coordination capacities strengthened

project_descr: UNDP continues to support the LMAC to improve the recovery conditions and re invigoration of Lebanon in its most affected areas.
